description: light and dark blue; tan interior and bottom; flat base; domed shape with domed cover; two round bar-like handles with conical ends; three decorative bands at bottom-groups of three vertical bars, geometricized leaf fronds and concentric circles, and flame-like and half-circle designs; triangle bands around mouth and cover; central large radiating floral design on cover
markings: under cover, on stickers:[(illegible/ lost) 74] and [1200]; on bottom, stamped: [L], [1646] and [M(?) and w/ Ggc.(?)]
title: Soup tureen and cover
